approvable.description: True if the column can be approved

editable.description: True if the column can be edited

pii.description: True if the column should be restricted to viewing only by the institution that owns it

gdpr.description: True if the column should be treated as a 'gdpr' column, subject to more strict auditing/logging

organizations.description: List of organizations/institutions who 'own' or should have unrestricted access to this field

approves_with.description: List of other columns, if any, that should be sent along when this column gets approved

cross_org_editable.description: True if the column is editable by both orgs no matter the owner
